name: chordNode_createAppt
description: Use this tool to create a new appointment for a patient. You must pass in the appointment slot time to create an appointment.
schema: [{"id":0,"property":"apptTime","description":"This is the time for the new appointment to be created.","type":"string","required":true},{"id":1,"property":"operatoryId","description":"This is the ID of the operatory slot for the appointment time.","type":"string","required":true}]
